name: 司潔妮
objective:
本課程目的在提升學生溝通表達能力，並著重於創業思維與專業英文。從專業英語文學習及創業的角度，讓學生了解流程與架構並實際演練，藉此提升學生學習及未來工作所需要之英文能力。
This course aims to enhance communicative competence with special emphasis on entrepreneurial thinking and professional English skills. From the perspectives of learning English for specific purposes (ESP) and entrepreneurship, students will learn how to create, rehearse and effectively participate in a range of different scenarios for current academic and future career pursuits.
schedule:
W1: Course Introduction & Material Overview

W2-3: Professional Business Communication

W4-5: Delivering Your Message

W6-7: Nonverbal Communication

W8-9: Midterm Presentation

W10: Course Project

W11-12: Presentation Organization

W13-14: Developing Presentations

W15-16: Group Communication, Teamwork, and Leadership

W17-18: Final Presentation
scorePolicy:
* 選修本課程，請務必準時到班上課。
* Any student who accumulates FIVE unexcused absences in the semester class will receive a no-credit status. 無故缺席 5 次，即無法獲得本課程學分。

(1) Class Performance (CP), including:
 - Midterm Presentation: 20%
 - Final Presentation: 20%
 - Chapter Presentation 10%
 - Participation & Assignment: 30%
 - Attendance: 20% (-5% for each absence)

(2) School-wide English Proficiency Exam (EPE)

Overall score = 80%(1) CP + 20%(2) EPE
